abstract.text: The Publisher interface is responsible for publishing media to a Millicast stream.
Create an AsyncStream that receives signaling errors.
Adds a video track to the publisher. See
as an example
for capturing a video device track.
Publish a stream with configuration options.
Creates an AsyncStream that receives connection state changes for the peer connection.
Clears all tracks added to the publisher.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives  viewer activity events
Asynchronously queries whether the publisher is currently connected.
Adds an audio track to the publisher. See
as an example
for capturing an audio device track.
Returns the current publisher credentials.
Get Combine based publisher that can be used to receive stats reports.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives stats reports.
The Publisher interface is responsible for publishing media to a Millicast stream.
Create an AsyncStream that receives http connection errors.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive viewer activity events
Starts recording a stream.
See the
for more information.
Initiates the process of publishing streams to the streaming platform.
Prior to calling this method, you must use the
or
method to connect the publisher to the platform.
When publishing, the SDK sets the AVAudioSession to the playAndRecord
category, with voiceChat mode and allowBluetooth option. If desired, the application
can configure the AVAudioSession with its own settings.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive connection state changes for the websocket
connection.
Stops recording a stream.
See the
for more information on how to access the recordings.
Stops the process of publishing streams to the streaming platform.
After calling this method, the SDK automatically terminates the connection
between the publisher and the streaming platform.
Connects and opens a websocket connection with the Millicast platform.  You must set valid credentials before using this method.
Sets the publisher credentials, providing authentication information
required for connecting to the streaming platform.
Initializes a publisher.
Asynchronously queries the currently set publisher credentials.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives viewer count updates.
The Subscriber class manages the subscription to audio and video tracks from the Millicast platform.
Asynchronously queries whether the publisher is currently publishing.
Connects to the media server directly using the websocket URL and the JSON Web Token.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive viewer count events
Initiates the audio capture process from the current source.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive http errors

and
Checks whether the publisher is currently in a publishing state
and returns a boolean indicating the publishing status.
Get a Combine based publisher that can be used to receive connection state changes  for the peer
connection.
Creates a new AsyncStream that receives connection state changes for the websocket connection.
